question: What is the name of the attack which happens when a malefactor executes a SQL query to the database via the input data from the client to server?
explanation: SQL Injection (SQLi) is a type of an injection attack that makes it possible to execute malicious SQL statements. It is a common issue with database-driven websites. It occurs when a malefactor executes a SQL query to the database via the input data from the client to server.
